Joyful Minimalist Christmas Photo Collage Holiday

Best Deals! Joyful Minimalist Christmas Photo Collage Holiday – Holiday Cards Joyful Minimalist Christmas Photo Collage Holiday products are in stock Joyful Minimalist Christmas Photo Collage Holiday order now with fast delivery service to your hand as soon as possibleSend Christmas wishes to your family and friends while showcasing some of your favorite moments from this year. Modern minimalist "joyful" Christmas holiday photo collage cards – a simple, peaceful design that reflects on all there is to be grateful for this holiday season. This beautiful design features a collage of nine square photos at the top of the card. The multi-photo collage reaches all the way until the edge of the card to give an extra classy feel. Below, in elegant script lettering, "joyful" is written, with long flourishes at either side, to reach the edge of the card and stay on theme with the photos. At the bottom of the card, there is your custom holiday greeting and your family members’ names. These cards reverse to a heartfelt message with "love" in the same boho minimal script lettering as the front and your family name in all caps. We have chosen an earthy, natural shade of sage green for the background, but this is an editable color and can be changed to any color that you would like! Holiday photo cards make such a special keepsake for the year to come. These cards were made with customization in mind, and all aspects of this design (fonts, text size, colors, background, image, placement) can be edited, moved, or removed to suit your needs. Click on "Personalize this template" to edit the text and upload your own photos. For more advanced modifications, simply scroll to "Click to customize further" and use the Zazzle design tool. Feel free to contact me if you need a hand with this design – I’ll be happy to help! Just note, that I can’t interfere with or modify an existing order. Browse the collections above or visit my store for more beautiful holiday photo cards! Wishing you a very merry Christmas and all the best for the new year! Price:$1.83

Best Deals! Joyful Minimalist Christmas Photo Collage Holiday ($1.83)
